about:
I am a Front-end Developer with over {years} years of experience, specializing in building scalable, high-performance applications using React (NextJS), React Native, and TypeScript.

I have extensive experience in modern front-end architectures, design systems, micro-frontends, and performance optimization. I am passionate about creating seamless user experiences, solving complex problems, and delivering high-quality software.
name: Name
placeholderMessage: Hi Atirson, Gone through your portfolio and would love to work/ collaborate with you

realProjects.subtitle: High-impact projects I've developed for companies and clients

projects.title: Vivo Fibra Residencial
projects.description: Led frontend development from zero to production for Vivo Fibra Lite (credit-card billing ‚Äî no monthly boletos).
highlights: Designed the frontend architecture and defined best practices for code quality, testing, and performance
Implemented unit and mutation testing using Jest and Stryker Mutator to increase reliability
Managed data fetching and caching with React Query for a fast, responsive UX
Built and maintained CI/CD pipelines with ArgoCD on Kubernetes; used Grafana for monitoring and observability
Integrated Stackspot AI (Zup) to create agents, knowledge sources and quick commands with VSCode integration
Collaborated closely with product, backend and DevOps teams to ensure smooth deployments and operability
projects.results: Achieved 1,000,000+ visits/month and generated over R$100k monthly revenue

projects.title: Driveway
projects.description: Enhanced the vehicle sales experience by developing high-quality solutions.
highlights: Developed high-quality components for the Design System
Investigated and fixed bugs, ensuring a stable and reliable platform
Managed release cycles, ensuring smooth deployments
Implemented unit and behavioral tests (Jest, Playwright) to maintain code quality
projects.results: Stable platform with high code quality and improved user experience

projects.title: Vitrine - Natura & Avon
projects.description: Led the development of Vitrine, an advanced system for consultants.
highlights: Optimized performance, quality, and reliability, handling high traffic efficiently
Scaled the system to support 100K+ requests per minute for 6M active consultants
Implemented robust architecture to ensure availability and speed
Collaborated with multidisciplinary teams to deliver a high-impact solution
projects.results: Scalable system supporting 6 million active consultants with 100K+ requests/minute

youtube.channelDescription:
Welcome to Atirson Dev üíª

Focusing on real technology, real projects, and best development practices. No Pokedex clones or purposeless tutorials ‚Äî the goal is to go beyond the obvious, creating useful and well-structured content to level up your dev skills.

videos.title: 5 Fatal Front-end Interview Mistakes (React/TS/JS) That Get You Rejected Instantly
videos.description: You might know React and TypeScript, but these 5 mistakes prove to the interviewer that you don't understand the fundamentals ‚Äî and that gets candidates rejected immediately.

videos.title: Are You Deploying Wrong? Learn These Patterns
videos.description: Understand the main Deployment Patterns used in production (Blue-Green, Canary, Rolling, A/B Testing) and how to reduce risks, downtime, and rollbacks in real systems.

videos.title: How to Create an Ubuntu Server on Orange Pi Zero 3 (Armbian Setup)
videos.description: Complete tutorial to transform your Orange Pi Zero 3 into a robust Ubuntu server using Armbian. Perfect for NAS, web servers, and home automation.

videos.title: Mentorship for Beginners: Your First Programming Job
videos.description: A complete guide on mindset, fundamentals, and practice for those seeking their first internship or junior position. Learn how to think like a software engineer.

list.title: üöÄ Being a Dev in 2026: Navigating the Challenges of Tech Modernity
list.description: A reflection on the skills needed for the developer of the future, AI, and the evolution of the software market.

list.title: The Most easy way to deploy your Micro-frontend React
list.description: A practical guide on simplifying the deployment of micro-frontend architectures using React and top CI/CD tools.

list.title: Running the KrakenD API Gateway on Heroku
list.description: Step-by-step guide on how to configure and run KrakenD, a high-performance API Gateway, on the Heroku platform.
